SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM article AS A INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE 1
AND A.boardId = #{boardId}
AND A.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND A.body LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND (A.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR A.body LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%'))
ORDER BY A.id DESC
LIMIT #{limitFrom}, #{itemsInAPage}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM article AS A WHERE 1
AND A.boardId = #{boardId}
AND A.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND A.body LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND (A.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR A.body LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'))
SELECT a.*, m.name AS 'extra__writer', b.name AS 'board_name' FROM article a INNER JOIN `member` m ON a.memberId = m.id INNER JOIN board b ON a.boardId = b.id WHERE a.id = #{id}
